question: 生まれる
sourceMnemonic: Since this is a kanji with hiragana attached that ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know that this word is a verb. What's the ultimate verb version of the kanji <ja>生</ja>? That would be <vocabulary>to be born</vocabulary>, the very beginning of life as we know it!
sourceReadingMnemonic:
You have to remember the <ja>う</ja> part of this word to read it. To remember that, let's use a mnemonic: 

Just imagine someone being born. All they do is scream: <reading>UUUUUuuUuuUUUuuuUUUuu</reading> (<ja>う</ja>) the whole time. Go ahead and imagine yourself being born and doing the same thing. Say UUUuuUUuuu out loud to help you to remember.
